benchmark_details.name: RiverEcho
benchmark_details.overview: RiverEcho is a real-time interactive intelligent system for ancient Yellow River culture, which integrates Automatic Speech Recognition, Large Language Models, Text-to-Speech, and Talking-head generation, providing professional and informative responses to user input.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance the dissemination and understanding of ancient Yellow River culture through a real-time interactive digital system.

data.source: A curated text corpus containing over 100 ancient manuscripts and modern editions related to the ancient Yellow River culture.
data.annotation: Automated preprocessing and manual verification by experts.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on user evaluations of the responses.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better response quality.
methodology.validation: The effectiveness of the proposed dataset was validated through subjective evaluation among over 100 participants.
